store/subscription.pause.title: Pause this subscription?
store/subscription.pause.text: By pausing, this subscription's items will no longer be ordered automatically. There are no extra fees and you can resume it anytime.
store/subscription.cancel.title: Cancel this subscription?
store/subscription.cancel.text: By canceling, this subscription's items will no longer be ordered automatically. There are no extra fees and this action cannot be undone.
store/subscription.restore.title: Restore this subscription?
store/subscription.restore.text: By resuming, this subscription's items will be ordered automatically again. You can cancel it again anytime, with no extra fees.
store/subscription.skip.title: Do you want to skip the next purchase of your subscription?
store/subscription.unskip.text: The next purchase of your subscription will be made and the following purchases will not be affected. You can change this setting until the order date.
store/subscription.unskip.title: Do you want to not skip the next purchase of your subscription?
store/subscription.skip.text: The next purchase of your subscription will not be made, but subsequent purchases will not be affected. You can change this setting until the order date.
store/subscription.skip.alert: Your next purchase will be skipped. You can change this setting until the order date.
store/subscription.view.title: Subscription with {value} products
store/subscription.notFound.title: You don't have subscriptions yet
store/subscription.notFound.text: Subscribe your favorite products and always find them here
store/subscription.periodicity.day: every {count, plural, one {# day} other {# days}}
store/subscription.periodicity.week: every {count, plural, one {# week} other {# weeks}}
store/subscription.periodicity.month: every {count, plural, one {# month} other {# months}}
store/subscription.periodicity.year: every {count, plural, one {# year} other {# years}}
store/subscription.alert.error.message: There was a payment problem on trying to place your current order. Configure your payment method to avoid future problems.
store/subscription.payment.alert.info.me: It wasn't possible to make a purchase with this payment method. Try again or choose another method.
store/subscription.name.editition.name.t: Choose a name to your subscription:
store/subscription.fallback.error.messag: Something went wrong, try again later!
store/subscription.execution.again.descr: This order won't interfere in your subscriptions next purchases and its dates.
store/subscription.shipping-address.erro: Invalid address, select a new valid address for this subscription.
The selected address is not available anymore.
store/subscription.purchase-settings.err: Invalid payment method, select a new valid payment for this subscription.
The selected payment method is not available anymore.
store/subscription.execution.status.FAIL: A problem has occurred while generating your order
store/subscription.execution.status.ORDE: A problem has occurred while generating your order
store/subscription.execution.status.SUCC: We tried to generate your order, but the products weren't in stock
We're able to generate your order, but one or more items weren't in stock
store/subscription.execution.status.RE_T: After an unsuccessful attempt, we're trying to generate your order again
store/subscription.products.card.title: Subscribed Products
An error occurred trying to remove this product, try again later.
If you remove it, it won't be ordered anymore on subscription.
